function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of investment in green areas could result in inadequate maintenance and deterioration, leading to decreased public health benefits and potential disease transmission risks.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Resistance to change in decision-making may limit the implementation of measures to enhance green area relevance and public health benefits.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of piloting mobility pattern changes","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Underutilization of smart city resources","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate governance of urban green spaces in latin american cities","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Differential access to green areas leading to avoidance of parks in poorer neighborhoods during the pandemic.","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of citizen participation in governance of urban green spaces during the pandemic.","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of expert-citizens on policy design without comprehensive stakeholder engagement.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of focus on non-capital cities and small cities in policy and research agendas","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of interdisciplinary personnel and networks in public services governance","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of training in ecosystems and environmental issues for top management in public services","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of training and network-related capital in inter-agency governance","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Leadership-dependent effectiveness in dedicated management governance","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of citizen participation in pandemic response","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of preparedness for adjusting public services during a time of crisis, leading to inadequate implementation of adaptive measures.","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of network and knowledge sharing among public service managers, hampering the ability to adapt services to changing demands during a crisis.","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inter-agency governance compensating for lack of training and network-related capital, leading to improved coordination and response to crisis situations.","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for transmission of contagious diseases in urban green spaces during a time of social crisis.","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Governance challenges in managing urban green spaces during the covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pilot opening of parks without monitoring precautions may lead to non-compliance with safety measures.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient communication and awareness","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective park closure as a response to controlling contagion","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Closure of parks not enforced","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of personnel to enforce safety protocols","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Desire to open parks without adequate safety measures","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Scarce personnel to monitor compliance with protocols","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Non-compliance with curfew measures and park restrictions","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Non-compliance with closure rules and mobility restrictions","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of restrictions around urban green spaces leading to complaints from drivers and traffic accidents","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impromptu protocols and loose guidelines from national governments may lead to ineffective or insufficient protocols for using public spaces, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in adapting personnel to perform new tasks may lead to inadequate enforcement of disease prevention measures and inefficient management of public events.","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the duration of the measures may lead to inadequate long-term planning, affecting budget allocation and personnel tasks.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in funding for public agencies responsible for urban green spaces may result in insufficient resources to implement effective disease prevention measures and maintain the facilities.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in enforcement leading to varying levels of actual mobility","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in designing mobility protocols for urban green spaces","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of enforcement of social distancing measures in public spaces","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent implementation of lockdown directives and measures","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Delay in implementing social distancing measures in some countries","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of transmission of contagious diseases in crowded urban green spaces","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of financial instability due to covid-19 impact on visitor numbers and funding sources","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of community transmission and outbreak in nearby communities due to park-related activities","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on permits and services for park funding","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of focus on the role management","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large number of urban green spaces managed by municipalities","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Underfunded municipal public services leading to inadequate maintenance of green spaces","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in funding sources and management autonomy of public service agencies","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of coordination between different municipal entities leading to ineffective management of urban green spaces","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"}]}
